column1: Weighted MRI size (256, 128, 1) in T2, showing the skull of a person a man of 37 years old, of axial section n°140 starting from the base of the skull. The image notably reveals the presence of: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3009.8145 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4543.0664 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 408.6914 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 394.1895 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 131.8359 mm³, the left putamen of volume 113.3789 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 130.5176 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3135.0586 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4349.2676 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 365.1855 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 415.2832 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 121.2891 mm³ and the right putamen of volume 118.6523 mm³.
